chapters.title: Chapter 20: Into Thakan'dar
chapters.info: Lord Rodrivar Tihera, p. 386—Lean noble from Tear (a very minor noble). Dark even for a Tairen, he has a short beard trimmed to a point. He is the Captain of the Stone of Tear, the man who leads the Defenders, and second in command under Rodel Ituralde at the battle of Thakan'dar. King Darlin listens well to his good tactical advice. He is not a Great Captain, but he is clever.
